actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on July 10, 2025.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Chair announced the Speaker's designation of the period from Monday, July 7, 2025, through Sunday, July 13, 2025, as a "district work period".
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
